overview: Doug Gifford is a real estate agent who is drowning in technology. When his tablet gets possessed by a serial killer, Doug soon finds out that upgrading to a newer model might cost him his life. Filled with thrills, chills and everything else that you've come to expect from a DV film, DV 4: Electric Nightmares reinvigorates Evan Jacobs' and Cinema Epoch's classic DV Franchise with a technological spin.
title: DV4: Electric Nightmares
